REMARK_EN: WATER LEVEL AND DISCHARGE DATA TO BE USED WITH EXTREME CAUTION DUE TO UNRELIABLE WATER LEVEL DATA
REMARK_FR: UTILISER DONNEES DU NIVEAU D'EAU ET DU DEBIT AVEC PRUDENCE CAR DONNEES DU NIVEAU D'EAU NON FIABLES.

REMARK_EN: DISCHARGE SHOULD BE USED WITH CAUTION
REMARK_FR: LE DEBIT DOIT ETRE UTILISE AVEC CIRCONSPECTION

REMARK_EN: Flow data September 09 - October 31 should be used with caution; data is estimated due to the effect of beaver activity.
REMARK_FR: Les donnees sur les debits du 9 septembre au 31 octobre doivent etre utilisees avec circonspection; les donnees sont estimees en raison des effets causes par l'activite des castors.

REMARK_EN: Discharge for June 29 & 30 should be used with caution.
Period of operation extended to November 07, 2016 in order to capture peak stage and discharge due to October rain events.
MAXIMUM INSTANTANEOUS DISCHARGE IS CONSIDERED ESTIMATED AS THE VALUE IS MORE THAN DOUBLE THE HIGHEST MEASUREMENT. DISCHARGE OCCURS AFTER BW-ICE ENDS EARLIER APRIL 3.
Due to measures in place to limit the spread of the coronavirus, regular visits to this station were reduced or no longer conducted throughout 2020 . This may have impacted data quality in 2020.
Maximum instantaneous and daily discharge considered invalid as they occurred during a period of estimated discharge record with no stage record.
